value.title: Automate Python deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Python.

value.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

value.title: Explore DevOps Continuous Security and Continuous Operations
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Security and Continuous Operations.

value.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Explore Azure DevOps capabilities and get started setting up your own organization knowing what separates elite performers from low performers.

value.title: Implement change tracking and file integrity monitoring for Windows IaaS VMs
value.excerpt: Implement change tracking and file integrity monitoring for Windows IaaS VMs

value.title: Load test Azure web apps by using Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Discover Azure portal and Azure DevOps tools that help you quickly and efficiently define and scale up load tests for apps.

value.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

value.title: Manage release cadence in Azure Pipelines by using deployment patterns
value.excerpt: Choose and implement a deployment pattern that helps you smoothly roll out new application features to your users.

value.title: Manage site reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Instrument a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservice
value.excerpt: This module guides you through implementing logging and monitoring in an ASP.NET Core microservices app in Azure Kubernetes Service.

value.title: Monitor Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines and hybrid instances
value.excerpt: You'll be able to implement Azure Monitor for IaaS Virtual Machines in Azure, implement Azure Monitor in on-premises environments, and use dependency maps.

value.title: Persist and retrieve relational data with Entity Framework Core
value.excerpt: This module guides you through creating a data access project, connecting to a relational database, and writing CRUD queries.

value.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Route system feedback to development teams
value.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

value.title: Run nonfunctional tests in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Run automated load tests by using Apache JMeter, a form of nonfunctional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Azure Load Balancer insights using Azure Monitor for Networks | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Erich Robinson-Tillenburg joins Scott Hanselman to demo and explain health monitoring and configuration analysis for Azure Load Balancer using Azure Monitor for Networks, a central hub that provides access to health and connectivity monitoring for all your network resources.  0:00 – Overview 1:16 – Load

value.title: Azure Monitor action groups | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Monitor action groups enable you to define a list of actions to execute when an alert is triggered. In this episode, we demonstrate how to configure a Service Health alert to use an action group. [00:50] Demo Start   Create and manage action groups in the Azure portal https://aka.ms/azfr/537/01
